results.title: NITROSOGENESIS OF SKIN (HUMAN) CANCER- THE HIDDEN TRUTH OF A NEVERENDING STORY: NITROSAMINE CONTAMINATION IN OLMESARTAN, VALSARTAN AND HCT AS MAIN RISK FACTOR FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF KERATINOCYTE CANCER.
results.text_hl: The newly introduced regulatory norms in practice concern the potential/permissive availability of @CHEMICAL_Nitrosamines @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009602 @@@nitrosamines@@@ in a serious number of drugs: drugs with radically different mechanisms of action such as: @CHEMICAL_Ranitidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011899 @@@ranitidine@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, ACE inhibitors, beta blockers, thiazide diuretics, sartans, @CHEMICAL_Rifampin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012293 @@@rifampicin@@@, but also probably a number of others.

citations.NLM: Tchernev G, Kordeva S. NITROSOGENESIS OF SKIN (HUMAN) CANCER- THE HIDDEN TRUTH OF A NEVERENDING STORY: NITROSAMINE CONTAMINATION IN OLMESARTAN, VALSARTAN AND HCT AS MAIN RISK FACTOR FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF KERATINOCYTE CANCER. Georgian Med News. 2023 Apr;(337):63-67. PMID: 37354675
citations.BibTeX: @article{37354675, title={NITROSOGENESIS OF SKIN (HUMAN) CANCER- THE HIDDEN TRUTH OF A NEVERENDING STORY: NITROSAMINE CONTAMINATION IN OLMESARTAN, VALSARTAN AND HCT AS MAIN RISK FACTOR FOR THE DEVELOPMENT OF KERATINOCYTE CANCER.}, author={Tchernev G and Kordeva S}, journal={Georgian Med News}, number={337}, pages={63-67}}

results.title: Graphene nanoflakes on transparent glass electrode sensor for electrochemical sensing of anti-diabetic drug.
results.text_hl: Overdose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Mf@@@ can cause @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@, @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhoea@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Cough</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003371 @@@cough@@@, or @DISEASE_Hoarseness @DISEASE_MESH:D006685 @@@hoarseness@@@, etc.

citations.NLM: Narang J, Malhotra N, Singhal C, Bhatia R, Kathuria V, Jain M. Graphene nanoflakes on transparent glass electrode sensor for electrochemical sensing of anti-diabetic drug. Bioprocess Biosyst Eng. 2017 Apr;40(4):537-548. PMID: 27995333
citations.BibTeX: @article{27995333, title={Graphene nanoflakes on transparent glass electrode sensor for electrochemical sensing of anti-diabetic drug.}, author={Narang J and Malhotra N and Singhal C and Bhatia R and Kathuria V and Jain M}, journal={Bioprocess Biosyst Eng}, volume={40}, number={4}, pages={537-548}}

results.title: A 37-Year-Old Man With Pleuritic Chest Pain.
results.text_hl: CASE PRESENTATION: A 37-year-old man with poorly controlled @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ presented with severe right-sided @DISEASE_Chest_Pain @DISEASE_MESH:D002637 @@@pleuritic chest pain@@@, respiratory splinting, and @<m>DISEASE_Cough</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003371 @@@cough@@@. Two weeks earlier, he had been evaluated at an urgent care for @<m>DISEASE_Cough</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003371 @@@cough@@@ and was prescribed a 5-day course of @CHEMICAL_Azithromycin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017963 @@@azithromycin@@@ for @DISEASE_Bronchitis @DISEASE_MESH:D001991 @@@bronchitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Galant-Swafford J, Light M, Onaitis MW, Rawlings SA, Fierer J, Landsberg JW. A 37-Year-Old Man With Pleuritic Chest Pain. Chest. 2019 Jul;156(1):e15-e21. PMID: 31279380
citations.BibTeX: @article{31279380, title={A 37-Year-Old Man With Pleuritic Chest Pain.}, author={Galant-Swafford J and Light M and Onaitis MW and Rawlings SA and Fierer J and Landsberg JW}, journal={Chest}, volume={156}, number={1}, pages={e15-e21}}

results.title: A 58-Year-Old Woman With Pneumonia and Gram-Negative Diplococci.
results.text_hl: Medications were @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Cholecalciferol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002762 @@@cholecalciferol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Folic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005492 @@@folic acid@@@, a multivitamin, @CHEMICAL_Fluticasone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068298 @@@fluticasone@@@ by inhalation, and, as needed, @CHEMICAL_Ipratropium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009241 @@@ipratropium@@@ by inhalation.

citations.NLM: Famularo G, Sordillo P, Stasolla A, Parisi MG. A 58-Year-Old Woman With Pneumonia and Gram-Negative Diplococci. Chest. 2017 Oct;152(4):e95-e97. PMID: 28991556
citations.BibTeX: @article{28991556, title={A 58-Year-Old Woman With Pneumonia and Gram-Negative Diplococci.}, author={Famularo G and Sordillo P and Stasolla A and Parisi MG}, journal={Chest}, volume={152}, number={4}, pages={e95-e97}}

results.title: Diabetes mellitus: an important risk factor for reactivation of tuberculosis
results.text_hl: We present a 45-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ born in Dominican Republic (DR), with 10-year history of T2DM treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, arrived to our Urgency Room complaining of @<m>DISEASE_Cough</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D003371 @@@dry cough@@@ for the past 3months.

citations.NLM: Solá E, Rivera C, Mangual M, Martinez J, Rivera K, Fernandez R. Diabetes mellitus: an important risk factor for reactivation of tuberculosis Endocrinol Diabetes Metab Case Rep. 2016;2016():. PMID: 27482384
citations.BibTeX: @article{27482384, title={Diabetes mellitus: an important risk factor for reactivation of tuberculosis}, author={Solá E and Rivera C and Mangual M and Martinez J and Rivera K and Fernandez R}, journal={Endocrinol Diabetes Metab Case Rep}, volume={2016}}
